name: Dragon Rail
description: A transportation system powered by dragons or dragon magic provides fast and impressive travel between distant locations. The dragon-powered transportation provides unique travel experiences and fast movement, while the dragon involvement and potential dragon-related accidents create constant danger.
atmosphere: Mighty dragons pull ornate carriages along enchanted rails that span impossible distances. Dragon fire powers the engines while magical rails channel draconic energy. The air fills with sulfur, ozone, and raw power. Passengers experience the thrill of flight at ground level.
